commands.reply: Script Stack Underflow (SSU) is glitch in speedrunning of GTA Vice City that allows users to jump to an abritrary location in the games mission scripts. No SSU is a categroty of speedrunning with allows for any other glitch exectp for SSU

Sliding is a method in GTA Vice City to move faster than walking, but slower than runnning. It is carried out by interrupting your character Tommy's animiation of moving, by playing a replay. It can be done whilsit unarmed or with some weapons such as a chainsaw
The radio is turned off as speedruns require recording, and this means that we can't have the radio on due to music copyright
